CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To verify the accuracy of the J sc measurement results , external quantum efficiencies ( EQEs ) of solar cells were measured under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. J sc measurement results - This is a measurement result, specifically the "J sc" value, which is a measure of the current-voltage characteristic of a solar cell.
2. External quantum efficiencies (EQEs) - This is a property of solar cells, specifically the efficiency of converting incident light into electrical current.
3. Monochromatic light - This is a property of the light used in the measurement, specifically the fact that it is of a single wavelength.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. External quantum efficiencies (EQEs) - This is a property of solar cells, specifically the efficiency of converting incident light into electrical current.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| External quantum efficiencies (EQEs) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To verify the accuracy of the J sc measurement results , external quantum efficiencies ( EQEs ) of solar cells were measured under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Property: Accuracy
2. Property: Quantum Efficiency (EQE)
3. Property: Monochromatic light

Explanation:

1. Accuracy: This is a property that refers to the degree of correctness or precision of the J sc measurement results.
2. Quantum Efficiency (EQE): This is a property that refers to the efficiency of converting incident light into electrical current in solar cells.
3. Monochromatic light: This is a property that refers to light that is composed of a single frequency or wavelength.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Property: Quantum Efficiency (EQE)
2. Value: accuracy

Explanation:

1. Quantum Efficiency (EQE) is a material property that refers to the efficiency of converting incident light into electrical current in solar cells.
2. Accuracy is a property that refers to the degree of correctness or precision of the J sc measurement results. In this context, accuracy refers to the accuracy of the measurement of the quantum efficiency of the solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Quantum Efficiency (EQE) |
| Accuracy |
